content: संहत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Struck together, wounded. {@--2@} Closed, shut. {@--3@} Wellknit, firmly united. {@--4@} Closely joined or allied; <ls>Ki. 1. 19.</ls> {@--5@} Compact, firm, solid. {@--6@} Combined, joined, keeping together, being in a body, being very close; जालमादाय गच्छंति संहताः पक्षिणोऽप्यमी <ls>Pt. 2. 8</ls>; <ls n="Pt.">5. 101</ls>; <ls>H. 1. 37.</ls> {@--7@} Of one accord. {@--8@} Assembled, collected.
